meanings.sent1: Sometimes, I misapprehend the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent2: It is easy to misapprehend someone's tone in a text message.
meanings.sent3: I misapprehended the recipe and ended up adding salt instead of sugar!
meanings.sent4: Do not misapprehend the silence for agreement.
meanings.sent5: She misapprehended the map and got lost in the city.

meanings.sent1: I tend to misapprehend sarcasm as seriousness.
meanings.sent2: It is common to misapprehend body language signals.
meanings.sent3: He misapprehended the joke and thought it was an insult.
meanings.sent4: Do not misapprehend her kindness for weakness.
meanings.sent5: The witness misapprehended the suspect's identity.
